directions: In a small bowl, stir together all ingredients except the ribs. Rub spice mixture all over the ribs. Cover and refrigerate ribs for at least 2 hours or up to 24 hours.
Place the ribs in a roasting pan. Bake for 1 to 2 hours, until meat easily pulls off the bones.
ingredients: 4 pounds baby back ribs, cut into 2-rib portions
title: Dry Rub Baby Back Ribs
